text: thumb Unaspis citri, known generally as citrus snow scale, is a species of armored scale insect in the family Diaspididae. Other common names include the orange chionaspi, orange snow scale, white louse scale, and white snow scale. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Insects described in 1883 Category:Diaspididae
title: Unaspis citri
